reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand the project layout and check the current configuration.

Steps I'll need to take:
1. View the repository structure
2. Check the pom.xml file(s) to understand the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update Java version to 17 in pom.xml
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check for issues
6. Fix any compilation or test issues that arise
7. Keep iterating until `mvn clean verify` succeeds
